text:
Indian Air Force’s Wing Commander Abhinandan Varthaman is finally back home and he has been given a hero-like welcome, which he truly deserves. People turned up in huge numbers to welcome the Braveheart back in his home country. Everyone had smiles on their faces as he came back!
The entire nation rejoiced yesterday after Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan announced that they are sending captured pilot Wing Commander Abhinandan Varthaman back to India as a peace justice. Indian Air Force, however, said that it wasn’t a goodwill gesture but the move was in line with the Geneva Conventions.
As he walked back home, everyone including Bollywood celebrities welcomed his homecoming. Take a look!
The entire nation welcomes you home Abhinandan. You are a true Hero. 🇮🇳 — Anushka Sharma (@AnushkaSharma) March 1, 2019
There is no better feeling than Coming back Home, for home is the place of love, hope & dreams. Ur bravery makes us stronger. Eternally grateful. #WelcomeBackAbhinandan pic.twitter.com/NFTRINu6Mw — Shah Rukh Khan (@iamsrk) March 1, 2019
Don't Miss 837 SHARES 862 SHARES 346 SHARES
Welcome back home #WelcomeBackAbinandan a true hero. These humane actions give hope that all humanity is not lost. Bharat mata ki Jai — Varun Dhawan (@Varun_dvn) March 1, 2019
It’s midnight & I cannot sleep. I’m so happy that #AbhinandanVartaman is going to be coming home. I can only imagine what his family feels right now. Every minute will feel like a lifetime & the heart will skip many beats. #WelcomeBackAbhinandan 🙏 We salute your bravery & valour — Preity G Zinta (@realpreityzinta) March 1, 2019
Welcome Back Home Dear #Abhinanadan - we salute your courage, bravery & service to our nation. 🇮🇳 🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳 — Riteish Deshmukh (@Riteishd) March 1, 2019
Saluting the valour and bravery of our Air Force Wing Commander #Abhinandan Varthaman.
Like the entire Nation, I would love to say #WelcomeHomeAbhinandan. — Boman Irani (@bomanirani) March 1, 2019
We salute your valour and the entire nation is extremely proud of you Wing Commander Abhinandan... Welcome home :) — Arjun Kapoor (@arjunk26) March 1, 2019
#WelcomeBackAbhinandan ... the nation has come to standstill and awaits you to walk back on Indian soil... we salute you and your bravery Sir ! — Neha Dhupia (@NehaDhupia) March 1, 2019
#WelcomeBackAbinandan .. you’ve shown us what courage in the face of fire is.. as a pilot’s wife and a fauji’s daughter-in-law one can’t help commending your family for their strength.. #inspired — Tisca Chopra (@tiscatime) March 1, 2019
Welcome and salute to our brave soldier #Abhinandan who showed nerves of steel in the face of the enemy. #WelcomeBackAbhinandan pic.twitter.com/QulFeUwjBi — Yo Yo Honey Singh (@asliyoyo) March 1, 2019
title: IAF Pilot Abhinandan Is Finally Home & Everyone Including Bollywood Stars Welcome India's Hero
